league.title: Krugersdorp Bowling Club League Teams

mens.reserves: Hans Bakker, Niekie Bester, Arthur Daniel, Gavin Heine, Peter Jacobs, Tom Kneen, Johan Landman, Ian McLaren, Brian Muldoon, Joe Price, Barry Rheeder, Herman Sliep, Hans van der Merwe, George van der Westhuizen, Rick van Zyl, Micheal Walker

ladies.reserves: Karen Barnes, Linda Bosch, Belinda Economakis, Elysses Heine, Theresa Klein, Melana Selby, Cheryl van der Westhuizen

league.selectionCommittee: Amanda Bekker, Dylan Leader, Kirstin Leader, Coenie Pieterse, Shauna Sliep, Cobus Smit, Jaco van Deventer (Convener)

notes.note: 1. NB! Please tick off your names if you are going straight to the venue.
2. League selections are available on our website - https://www.krugersdorpbowlingclub.co.za/league_teams
3. Captains, Please ensure players in your team are informed about venue and departure time.
4. Captains, Please ensure that the venues and opponents are correct.
5. Captains, Please provide feedback to a selector on your teams and individual performances before Monday.
5. Captains, Please ensure that your teams comply with the dress code.
